definitions.definition: The wound left behind after having been bitten.
The swelling of one's skin caused by an insect's mouthparts or sting.
definitions.example: After just one night in the jungle I was covered with mosquito bites.

definitions.definition: A piece of food of a size that would be produced by biting; a mouthful.
definitions.example: There were only a few bites left on the plate.
That song is a bite of my song!
I'll have a quick bite to quiet my stomach until dinner.

definitions.definition: The hold which the short end of a lever has upon the thing to be lifted, or the hold which one part of a machine has upon another.
A cheat; a trick; a fraud.
A blank on the edge or corner of a page, owing to a portion of the frisket, or something else, intervening between the type and paper.
A cut, a proportion of profits; an amount of money.
A fish that tends to take bait.
A stone that barely touches the outside of the house.
One who copies someone else's work, style or techniques, especially in hip-hop.
(in combination) Something (a data unit, machine etc.) with a width of a specified amount of bits.
